Text: Just letting you all know, to be patient, these files are on my lap top and I can only seed when I am on Wi-Fi. So it might be a few days till the entire torrent has made it around, the size is quite big. Just stick with it, and know that I will be seeding for weeks to come, just be patient, until the torrent makes it around.

Also since I can't seed it this 24/7 unfortunately, I have set this up for Super Seeding, to make sure that you guys get a nice even spread of data. If you don't know what Super Seeding is, ignore this message.
